frameDefinitions: An Agent removes a Theme from a Source so that the it is in the Agent's possession.
The action of an Agent or the occurrence of a Cause event returns an Entity to an earlier  state of vigor and strength.
A Cognizer applies oneself to commit a Pattern to memory, so that the Cognizer would recognize future examples of the Pattern or be able to reproduce it.
In this frame an Agent continues to possess a Theme for a Duration of time. ''

A Financial_instrument (a bond or insurance) fulfills a condition at a certain Time after which the Issuer of the Financial_instrument is legally obligated to pay the Holder a monetary Value, based on the instrument's original Principle and the Interest rate.
A Recipient (who may or may not be agentive) ends up in possession of a Mass_theme (which may be conceptualized as a single mass entity, or may be a group of individual entities).
frameExamples: Milton <t>took</t> the can of beer out of the refrigerator.
Falling prices and wireless connectivity have <t>breathed new life</t> into the PDA market.
A gaggle of students were frantically <t>memorizing</t> the answers out in the hall.
In her heart she must <t>retain</t> bitterness against those who had killed him.
The bond had <t>matured</t> to its full value at 30 years.
Bogs <t>accumulate</t> carbon for thousands of years.
listRoleDefinitions: The person who takes possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> takes possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The location of the <fen>Theme</fen> prior to the taking.
When the taking takes place.
Where the taking takes place.
The concrete or abstract thing that is brought into an earlier state in which it was more effective and powerful.
The <fen>Agent</fen> puts the <fen>Entity</fen> into a state of renewed vigor.
An event or state whose occurrence brings about the <fen>Entity</fen>'s return to a vigorous state.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Agent</fen> causes the renewal of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the Agent brings about the change in the <fen>Entity</fen>'s state.
The sentient being that focuses on a <fen>Pattern</fen> so that it will remain in the memory.
The phenomenon that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> observes and commits to memory.
The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> memorizes the <fen>Pattern</fen>.
The location wherein the <fen>Cognizer</fen> memorizes the <fen>Pattern</fen>.
The person who has possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The entity which the <fen>Agent</fen> possesses for a <fen>Duration</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Agent</fen> has possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> keeps the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The bond, insurance, or debt security which a Holder buys from an Issuer.
When the <fen>Financial_instrument</fen> reaches maturity.
The <fen>Recipient</fen> indicates the entity that ends up in possession of the <fen>Mass_theme</fen>.
The collection of objects that ends up in the <fen>Recipient</fen>'s possession.
When the event occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> denotes where the <fen>Mass_theme</fen> is acquired.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Milton</fex> took the can of beer out of the refrigerator.
Milton took <fex>the can of beer</fex> out of the refrigerator.
Milton took the can of beer <fex>out of the refrigerator</fex>.
The government seizure of a suspected dissident's computer <fex>last November</fex> has increased the tension between citizens and law enforcement.
Police seized several tons of marijuana <fex>in Berkeley</fex> last weekend.
The reinvigoration <fex>of the tourism</fex> economy is recognised by many as an ambitious but necessary objective.
<fex>We</fex> revitalized the Golden Mountaineer Card, and we gave seniors a prescription drug benefit.
Rock has been rejuvenated creatively and commercially <fex>by hip-hop-inspired rock acts</fex>.
Production was revitalized <fex>last June</fex>.

New York's distinction as America's tax cut leader has revitalized the economy
<fex>in every corner of the state</fex>.
<fex>I</fex> have memorized two kinds of knowledge from Allah's Apostle
Impress your friends by memorizing <fex>your phone numbers</fex> and throwing away your PDA!
Barney memorized the poem <fex>yesterday</fex>.
Herbert Kornfeldt memorized his speech <fex>in the mailroom</fex>.
At all times <fex>the Saxon government</fex> held on to its insistently practiced political tradition.
Once you've got a War Bond, hang on to <fex>it</fex> for the full ten years of its life.
Margerite held on to the key <fex>on Wednesday</fex> until I returned to pick it up.
He will retain <fex>in his heart</fex> the memory of the vast Holocaust.
<fex>West Shore Railroad bonds</fex> never mature.
Treasury bonds mature <fex>after 30 years</fex>.
